bug.author: LoudeNOUGH
bug.summary: "Undo last action" operation for brush, wand, and polygon
bug.description:
Related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jsbroks/coco-annotator/issues/18>#18</denchmark-link>
Only Eraser is capable of fixing the incorrect action, so undo operation for brush, wand, and polygon is necessary

comments.comment: All options have the ability to undo the last action. But the tool icon does not seem to be working. If you us the hotkey ctrl+z does it undo your last action?
Due to author inactivity, I will be closing this issue. A fix for the undo icon has been committed.

I have this issue occasionally but I can't reproduce it. When this happens I also can't disable the tool I'm using by pressing ESC, and sometimes the lines of the polygon tool stays in the screen, even though I start a new polygon. There's no errors neither in the server nor in the browser. I fix the problem by reloading the page.
